author: dws
msg: * STATUS : Note follow-on patch for Redhat 7.X.

author: dws
msg: Note: The 1.1.0 branch and trunk don't seem to have this problem so I'm just
fixing it here.
Votes: +1: david, ghudson; +0: bliss
* packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/doc.patch : Fix book Makefile patch to work again
after breakage that happened right before 1.0.7 was released.  This also
fixes the shell-script bug where the number was not being inserted
correctly because of the parentheses instead of braces.
* packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/subversion.spec : Fix specfile to output the version
to the book version.xml instead of the release.

author: dws
msg: * STAUTS : Vote for 11143.

author: dws
msg: Note: The 1.1.0 branch and trunk don't seem to have this problem so I'm just
fixing it here.
Votes: +1: david, ghudson; +0: bliss
* packages/rpm/redhat-8+/doc.patch : Fix book Makefile patch to work again
after breakage that happened right before 1.0.7 was release.  This also
fixes the shell-script bug where the number was not being inserted
correctly because of the parentheses instead of braces.
* packages/rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec : Fix specfile to output the version
to the book version.xml instead of the release.
